content_formats: In-depth tutorials (e.g., '30 Days to Your First 1,000 Leads')
content_analysis.style_notes: Long-form educational content that provides comprehensive insights. Uses unique storytelling abilities and compelling narratives. Content has longevity - videos from 5-6 years ago still get thousands of views monthly. Not yet 'cracked the code' on YouTube according to Russell himself, but values the platform for its content longevity compared to other social media.

additional_insights.video_performance: Videos grow over time; viral videos have garnered millions of views
additional_insights.content_strategy: YouTube content is 'basically the start of a funnel most of the time' - focusing on organic traffic rather than paid ads. Getting 100K views organically vs paying $10K-$30K for paid ads.
additional_insights.cross_platform_strategy: Content ports to TikTok, Facebook Reels, and YouTube Shorts. Shorts feed long-form YouTube, then email list and community.
additional_insights.unique_approach: Very particular about mastering the platform; doesn't feel like they've cracked the code yet but committed to figuring it out
